name: Hosey Common to Mariners Hill Loop Walk, Chartwell

ai.summary: A challenging 17.9 km loop starting at Hosey Common and looping to Mariners Hill, near Chartwell. The route blends country lanes, chalk tracks, woodland paths and open heath with notable elevation gain. Suited to experienced hikers comfortable with long distances, varied surfaces and changing weather.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain including tarmac and gravel tracks, narrow lanes, woodland paths and open heath. Expect steep ascents and descents, uneven surfaces, gates and stiles, and mud after rain. Some sections may expose walkers to wind on higher ground; short, rough stretches may require careful footing.
ai.safety_notes: Hard hike requiring good fitness. Check forecast and daylight hours; pack accordingly. Wear sturdy boots and dress in layers with a waterproof outer layer. Bring a map or GPS, fully charged phone, water and snacks. Inform someone of your plan, practice safe navigation in exposed sections, and be prepared for sudden weather changes and variable terrain.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots with good grip
Map and compass or fully charged GPS
Phone power bank and emergency contact information
Small first aid kit and blister care
Headlamp or compact torch for early/late starts
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for milder conditions and better visibility; year-round hiking is possible but winter can be muddy with shorter daylight and weather hazards.

seo.title: Hosey Common to Mariners Hill Loop Walk, Chartwell – 17.9 km Hard UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore the 17.9 km Hosey Common to Mariners Hill Loop Walk near Chartwell, UK. A challenging route with mixed terrain and elevation—plan with terrain notes, safety tips, and gear recommendations.
